game.name: Cosmos point
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Control a squad of fighters in turn-based battles. The game pays great attention to the details of equipment - weapons, backpacks, a lot of grenades and other devices. More resources taken out of the mission - more improvements at the base. There are no useless items, there is a small backpack.
